title: Sequestered pocket of the Delaware Bay.
description: Entry provides instant invitation to unwind with its tumble marble ceramic tile floor and gorgeous stone floor-to-ceiling FP straight ahead. Step up to hardwood floors and great room before FP where vaulted ceiling, exposed beams and ceiling fan are added accents. To left is L -shaped Corian countertop bar where 5 bar stools wrap and 3 pendant lights illuminate area. Maple cabinets, complete with DW and tumble marble backsplash with stunning ceramic glass decorative square inset, provide backdrop for tile splash and bowl sink. Pull up a stool, sit and soak up the beach vibe. Beyond bar area is DR where hardwood floors continue and 3 windows with natural wood trim span front wall. Just-right all-around ambiance with its corner cabinet, bamboo-leaf ceiling fan and built-in desk area with 2 stools tucked under. From DR to kitchen hardwoods transition back to tumble marble ceramic tile floor and gallery bar opens up to spacious trendy kitchen. This kitchen pays homage to cottage atmosphere with vaulted ceiling and skylight, both aptly highlight tumble marble backsplash with design behind range and sleek SS/black appliances, including double oven and DW, and upscale stove exhaust.

title: 2 Car Garage Home in Pennsport
description:
Spacious 3 bedroom, 2 full and 2 half bath, home in the wonderful Pennsport neighborhood. This light-filled townhome has a Two Car Garage, a large roof deck offering spectacular views of the city, Ben Franklin Bridge and the Delaware waterfront; and a finished half-basement. The house has hardwood floors throughout and a carpeted basement. Home has dual zone heating and cooling making all floors comfortable.
You will enter the house into a large mudroom that can double as an office or gym with a large entry closet and half bath on this floor which leads to the 2 car garage.
One floor up is the large open concept living room, dining room, and kitchen and another half bath. The kitchen includes a large 10 ft long island and plenty of pantry space. The appliances are all stainless steel.
Above the main level you will find 2 generous sized bedrooms with large closets, 1 of which is a walk in and a full bath complete with double sink and bathtub. The laundry room with included washer and dryer are also on this floor.
Another floor up is the master suite which includes a large bedroom with 2 closets, 1 of which is a giant walk in, a hallway closet, a space for a bar in the hallway and a master bath which has double sink, a stone floor, pebbled large shower, and separated toilet room for privacy.
Below, the finished basement makes a perfect space for working out or a media/play room.
The house is in a very convenient location - a short walk to Herron Park and Splash Ground, Jefferson Square Park, Dickinson Square Park, Herman's Coffee and Market, Pennsport beer boutique, Federal Donuts, Cake and Joe for sandwiches and beautiful cakes, CrossFit, Ginza for delicious sushi, Aroma on 3rd for amazing Italian and the new Giant for all your grocery shopping. Nearby shopping on Delaware Ave includes Target, Acme, Fine Wines & Good Spirits, Ikea, Lowes, and Home Depot. There's also quick access to I-95, Walt Whitman Bridge, Ben Franklin Bridge, and Philadelphia International Airport.
Minimum one-year lease, longer lease preferred. One and a half month deposit, first months rent and last month rent due on signing.
Renters responsible for all utility bills including gas, water, electric, sewer, tv, internet etc. The city charges two water bills, one for the sprinkler system and one for your water usage.
Up to two medium sized pets (45 pounds) allowed. There will be a onetime $500 deposit per pet and $100 rent per pet per month.
Strictly no smoking allowed in the house.
Tenant is responsible for shoveling snow from the sidewalk in front of the house within 24 hours of snow stopping. Tenant is responsible for shoveling snow from the private driveway (In the past 7 years, the driveway has required shoveling only 3 times).
Two car parking is available in the garage and included in the lease.

2nd floor 1 bedroom, large 796 square foot apartment for rent on September 7th, 2022. Once the current tenant vacates on September 1st, 2022 it will be move-in ready for September 7th, 2022. New tenant will be responsible for electric, cable t.v. and internet in your name. Included are water, sewer, trash pick-up, snow removal, and gas heat. Tenant will have use of the large 2nd floor deck with awesome views. . We are located on the water and directly next to a pet friendly park, so plenty of outdoor opportunities. No smoking in the inside of the apartment but outside is OK. Tenant must be responsible, clean, quiet and courteous of others on the property.
The house is well kept, quiet atmosphere NOT looking for someone with loud friends or party people. Would entertain prospect with pet for additional rent & non-refundable deposit and must be a responsible pet parent, no barkers. We are 15 minutes from center city Philadelphia and can walk to local eateries, Pubs, and shopping. Public transit and speed-line are close by.
We will do a background and credit check at tenants expense.
Monthly Rent                   = $1,250.00
